Test Name: C2 Complement, Functional, with Reflex, Serum
Purpose: To outline the process and procedures for the analysis of C2 Complement, ensuring accurate, reliable, and timely results.
Container: Serum tube (e.g., red-top or serum separator tube)
Equipment: Plate washer; Microplate reader; Refrigerated centrifuge; Incubator (37°C); Freezer (-20°C or below)
